description: Verifies that the specific text is visible in the Live Lesson sub-module on the Student Information Screen

steps.name: Login to the application with valid credentials
Navigate to the Student Information Screen
Navigate to the Live Lesson Page
Verify the visibility of the thesis information text on the My Lesson page
